summary: The document is a secret communication from May 1978, detailing the absence of known contacts between members of the Vlaamse Militanten Orde (VMO) and American citizens from 1968 to 1970. It also highlights opposition to the preparation of a report on the VMO for the House of Representatives Committee and to the sharing of articles from quarterly or semi-annual reports with the committee.
key_findings: No information on contacts between VMO members and American citizens from 1968 to 1970.
Opposition to preparing a report on the VMO for the House of Representatives Committee.
Opposition to sharing certain reports with the committee.
